title: Al-Hayat
additional-note: This a British publication. Its contents may still be copyrighted even without renewals or copyright notices, if they meet GATT copyright restoration requirements for works first published outside the US. It was originally a Lebanese publication.  Before its demise in 2020, it maintained offices in the US as well as in other countries, though we do not know when they opened.
acknowledgement: Thanks to Lloyd Frank for copyright research on this title.
